scripts.api:clean: docker stop feature-api && docker rm feature-api && docker rmi feature/api:latest
scripts.api:all: npm run api:clean && npm run api:build && npm run api:run
scripts.nginx:clean: docker stop feature-nginx && docker rm feature-nginx && docker rmi feature/nginx
scripts.nginx:all: npm run nginx:clean && npm run nginx:build && npm run nginx:run
scripts.start: npm run api:all && npm run nginx:all
